author: matzew
msg: merged overhaul from plugins release brunch to trunk:
-The overhaul was mainly adding the proper (correct) ASF license header to all files, which are inside of the src/ folder.
-Also added the ASF license header to the Maven-Faces-Plugin to ensure that all generated components contain the same proper header as well
-Finally deleted two empty oracle folders, because not needed.
